hotels.title: Five-Star Cordoba Stay within a Roman-Style Villa
hotels.description: Built with a thoughtfully resorted Roman-style villa, Hospes Palacio del Bailío is an oasis in the centre of Cordoba that combines old-world luxury with modern touches. Escape to this urban retreat in city's heart and explore nearby sights including the Cordoba mosque just a short walk away. Plunge into a crystal-clear pool framed by fruit trees, dine on locally inspired dishes at Arbequina restaurant, be pampered with soothing massage at Bodnya Spa or soak at the hotel's indoor Roman Baths.
